actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Jose Ramone Valenzuela-Barrera, his wife Elvia Luz Ochoa-Santiesteban and their minor children, Maria Leticia Valenzuela-Ochoa, Juan Roman Valenzuela-Ochoa, and Lucia Maria Valenzuela-Ochoa.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of Jose Ramone Valenzuela-Barrera, his wife Elvia Luz Ochoa-Santiesteban and their minor children, Maria Leticia Valenzuela-Ochoa, Juan Roman Valenzuela-Ochoa, and Lucia Maria Valenzuela-Ochoa.
